name: Ascent (Simsure)
description:
Ascent will catapult you into a millennial temple, buried and abandoned for long time.

But something is awakening from its depths, looking for a way out, who knows for what dark reason ...
Eliminate all the floor tiles and reach the teleportation platform to continue your climb, but be careful of the various traps, mazes and pitfalls that the temple can hide.

This game was made for the 2017 Game Maker Italy annual Jam.
